FACTS
LIKE MY PAGE ON FACEBOOK
Mater. The rusty old tow truck, proprietor of Tow Mater Towing and Salvage, is grand storyteller and the heart and soul of Radiator Springs. Mater appears in this poster another 2 times.

Mater. The rusty old tow truck, proprietor of Tow Mater Towing and Salvage, is grand storyteller and the heart and soul of Radiator Springs. Here he's disguised as a Geisha. Mater appears in this poster another 2 times.

Mater. The rusty old tow truck, proprietor of Tow Mater Towing and Salvage, is grand storyteller and the heart and soul of Radiator Springs. Here he's distracting a Royal Guard. Mater appears in this poster another 2 times.

Lightning's off-season is cut short when Mater enters him into the World Grand Prix, a race that will take him to Japan, Italy and England. Competing against the fastest cars in the world tests more than his racing skills when Lightning realizes his best friend may not be the pit chief he needs to navigate the unfamiliar international terrain.

Francesco Bernoulli grew up in the shadow of the famous Monza race course in Italy. The ladies love Francesco's open wheels, youngsters look up to his winning spirit and fellow racers envy his speed. Francesco appears in this poster another 2 times.

Francesco Bernoulli grew up in the shadow of the famous Monza race course in Italy. The ladies love Francesco's open wheels, youngsters look up to his winning spirit and fellow racers envy his speed. Francesco appears in this poster another 2 times.
John Lassetire is an all-American pickup truck, serving as the pit crew chief for Jeff Gorvette in the World Grand Prix. Rumors in the pits say he's even based on the Director, John Lasseter.

International Intelligence. Finn McMissile is a master British spy. Though charming eloquent, it's his stealth manoeuvring and years in the field that enable him to thwart unexpected attacks from bad guys.
Holley Shiftwell is a beautiful young British desk agent, turned spy-in-training who's stationed in Tokyo. She's armed with the latest state-of-the-art spy equipment imaginable.

Sally (2002 Porsche 911) from the original Cars movie. Sally, a baby blue Porsche 911 Carrera, is the proprietor of Radiator Springs' Cozy Cone and Wheel Wagon Motels and the apple of Lightning McQueen's eye.
Sheriff (1949 Mercury Police Cruiser) from the original Cars movie. Sheriff is the local law enforcement and the keeper of the peace in Radiator Springs. He takes his job very seriously.
Ramone (1959 Impala lowrider) from the original Cars movie. Ramone owns and operates Ramone's House of Body Art, Radiator Springs' custom body and paint shop.
Mack (1980's mack Super-Liner) from the original Cars movie. Mack is Lightning McQueen's trusted long-haul driver, crisscrossing the country from race to race, always with a smile on his grill.
Flo from the original Cars movie. Flo is a sassy, no-nonsense lady who runs the local diner, Flo's V-8 Café, the only gas station for miles around.
Red (mid-1960's closed cab pumper) from the original Cars movie.

Guido, the little Italian forklift, is the backbone of Luigi's Casa Della Tires. Joining Team Lightning McQueen for the World Grand Prix, Guido will get to show off his turbo-charged, pedal-to-the-metal pit stops on the global stage, and maybe, just maybe, he'll see some Ferraris!
The surrounds of the clock in London are based on the real Bentley emblem.
Neon Lotso Huggin Bear from Pixar's Toy Story 3.
Harryhausen Sushi sign chopsticks from Pixar's Monsters Inc.
The Pope-mobile is driving through Italy.
The Queen of England is driving by Tower Bridge.
To all who know her, Luigi's aunt, Mama Topolino, is a masterful cook with the best fuel in the village of Santa Ruotina, near Porto Corsa, Italy.

Darrell Cartrip is a legendary multi-Piston Cup champion turned beloved racing announcer. The Kentucky-born #17 Chevrolet Monte Carlo is known for his wild color commentary, delighting Piston Cup fans with his humor, charisma and signature catchphrase "Boogity, Boogity, Boogity!"

Sir Miles Axlerod is a former oil baron who has sold off his fortune, converted himself into an electric vehicle and has devoted his life to finding the renewable, clean-burning energy source of the future. Axlerod is also the car behind the World Grand Prix.
Luigi is a big-hearted Italian Fiat 500. A tire virtuoso and owner of Luigi's Casa Della Tires, he and sidekick Guido join Lightning and Mater on Team Lightning McQueen for the World Grand Prix.

Lewis Hamilton. With his striking metallic black and yellow paint scheme, Lewis will represent Great Britain at the World Grand Prix. His unrivalled technical skills, natural speed ability and cool, karate-inspired attitude make him a powerful contender too.

Raoul ÇaRoule. Known as the "World's Greatest Rally Car," Raoul ÇaRoule was born in Alsace, France. Raoul is confident he can use his rally experience to pull ahead of his fellow World Grand Prix racers during the three courses' touchy dirt sections.
Can you spot Mater on his 'flying visit' through Italy?
Can you see Mater dressed as a Japanese Geisha?
Mater's on royal guard distracting duty. But where is he?
Can you see Lightning McQueen, leading the way in Tokyo?
Can you see Francesco Bernoulli chasing the lead in Japan?
Can you find Francesco Bernoulli leading the race?

Holley Shiftwell also flies well! Can you see her?

Can you find Red, the fire engine from Radiator Springs?

It's time to find Big Bentley! Can you see it?
Can you find the neon Lotso Huggin Bear from Toy Story 3?
Can you find the sushi sign inspired by Monsters Inc.?
A petrol-powered Pope? Can you spot the Pope-Mobile?
Never mind the Royal Wedding, can spot the Royal Car?
Can you find Luigi's aunt, Mama Topolino?
Can you find Darell Cartrip, the Piston Cup commentator?
Miles Alexrod is the car behind the World Grand Prix. Where is he?
Luigi has a big heart for such a little car. Can you find him?

Can you find French rally car Raoul ÇaRoule?
